Plot: When 24-year-old Riley Hamerson decides it’s time for a change she makes a big one: moving to London. With high hopes of becoming a successful writer she first has to get her feet on the ground. Riley takes the usual route, she get’s a job at the posh Railroad Club and finds a friend through a regular named Ron. Everything is moving along smoothly until one afternoon when someone breaks into her flat. What she soon discovers about her thief turns Riley’s world upside down. Stepping into a new game, Riley decides it’s time to play.
